verbose_text: As a result, the production of matrix metalloproteinases (MMPs) as well as the extracellular matrix (ECM) components, is enhanced, which are then utilized for tissue reconstruction, as summarized in XREF_FIG b. Of note, MMP-3 was found to go back into the nuclei of producers to further enhance CCN2 expression in chondrocytes, representing the collaborative action of CCN2 and MMP-3 [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
